[ library(calendar) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

dwy_to_mjd(++DWY, ++FirstWeekday, ?MJD)

Convert a DayOfWeek/WeekOfYear/Year representation to MJD
DWY
Structure of the form Day/Week/Year
FirstWeekday
Atom (monday,tuesday,etc)
MJD
Variable or integer

Description

as dwy_to_mjd/2, but allows to choose a different starting day for weeks, specified as atom monday, tuesday etc
